attributes.action: scrap the TV license fee because the TV license fee goes against traditional business values for other broadcasters, giving an overly competitive advantage to the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The TV license fee goes against traditional business values for other broadcasters, giving an overly competitive advantage to the BBC, who are guaranteed income every single year (unlike most operators/broadcasters).

I believe the fee should be scrapped, or distributed equally amongst all broadcasters and channel providers as the current system is unfair and does not represent a true and accurate model of business.

scrap the fee or level the playing field

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FairpayTV/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
